settings.slide_heading: SAVE 40% on fresh coffee delivered to your door.

settings.heading: Subscribe to our newsletter
settings.subheading: A short sentence describing what someone will receive by subscribing

settings.title: perfectly roasted, shipped the same day
settings.text: Subscribe and receive fresh Storyville Coffee, every two weeks, on your doorstep.  We choose the finest beans, then roast and blend to perfection.

settings.title: Premium coffee, delivered to your door.
settings.text: Storyville's premium blended beans are made in small batches in Seattle, and shipped to you within a few hours of roasting.

settings.title: World’s First Complete Home Coffee Press System
Better beans make a better cup.
Premium coffee, delivered to your door.
settings.text: Pair large text with an image to give focus to your chosen product, collection, or blog post. Add details on availability, style, or even provide a review.

settings.code:
ELECTRIC

WATER KETTLE





Fall in love with the ritual. Anticipate the start of your perfect cup. Our kettle will take your coffee experience to another place. With the flip of a switch, the 52 ounce, electric powered stainless steel thermos heats your water in under three minutes. At just the right time, the kettle automatically shuts off, allowing you the freedom to enjoy your ritual. To send as a gift or learn more click here: More Info



75

75

CONICAL

BURR GRINDER





Precision meets beauty. The Storyville Conical Burr Grinder stands out from the rest, producing an exceptional, uniform grind that leads to the perfect cup of Storyville Coffee. Thoughtfully designed to give you the control you need. To send as a gift or learn more click here: More Info



195

195

STAINLESS STEEL

COFFEE PRESS





Fall in love with the ritual. Our 48 ounce Coffee Press not only looks stunning on your counter, but it’s the simplest way to deliver a perfect cup of coffee every time. Enjoy the aroma and flavor produced when precious oils, stolen in a drip machine, are delivered to your cup. To send as a gift or learn more click here: More Info



110

110

THE

ESSENTIALS





The perfect pair. The world’s most popular ritual just got a whole lot better. Whether it’s for you or your guests, we don’t call it The Essentials for nothing. Includes the Conical Burr Grinder and a 48-ounce Coffee Press. To send as a gift or learn more click here: More Info



275

275

STORYVILLE

FREEDOM I

The Complete Home Brewing System. This is the foundation of it all. The Freedom I was created to bring passion and focus back to your ritual. We’ve designed every step of the coffee journey – each piece articulately designed and packaged to offer you and your guests a truly exceptional brewing experience. Everything you need to take your ritual to the highest level. To send as a gift or learn more click here: More Info



745

745

PORCELAIN

MUG





Understated Elegance. Emblazoned with Flyboy, our 12-ounce Porcelain Mug will inspire you every day, with each sip. Made from high-temperature ivory porcelain, these fine-grade vessels are dishwasher safe. To send as a gift or learn more click here: More Info



15

15

STORYVILLE

ACCESSORY KIT





Tools for success. Ensure your ritual gets started the right way. Includes Timer, 2 stainless steel stir spoons, and 1/4 cup measuring cup. Our Accessory Kit has everything you need to craft the perfect cup every step of the way. To send as a gift or learn more click here: More Info



25

25

$11


SHIPPED EVERY 3 WEEKS FOR $33
PLUS FREE USPS PRIORITY MAIL®

3-WEEK PLAN

( LIMITED OFFER )



SUBSCRIBE GO TO CHECKOUT

PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION

STORYVILLE ANYWHERE

Storyville Coffee at home. Subscribe and receive 3 bags of fresh coffee, every 3 weeks for $33. We roast to order and ship same day ship with free USPS Priority Mail®.



AUTO DISCOUNT

Automatic discount on ALL Storyville products.

ONLINE CONCIERGE

Increase, reduce or pause your subscription.

YOU'RE THE BOSS

Cancel anytime, because you’re in charge.

FREE

USPS PRIORITY
MAIL®

FOR SUBSCRIBERS ONLY

FRESH

Unparalled quality, premium beans, artfully roasted.

24 Ounces

3 bags roasted to order, and rushed to you.

RESEALABLE

One-way degassing valve preserves freshness.

PREMIUM BLEND


The finest beans roasted fresh in Seattle, WA, and rushed to you within hours. It's unbelievably smooth, with a flavor profile so perfect, you'll likely drink it black. Experience the "#1 Roaster in America" at home anywhere, every day.
SUBSCRIBE NOW

"Storyville coffee is THE BEST coffee that I have ever had. I can’t even explain in words the richness and smoothness of this coffee!"



– Brenda H.

ROASTED TO ORDER

MADE IN SEATTLE

SEATTLE, WA

PIKE PLACE



We are on the TOP FLOOR of the Corner Market building at First & Pike in Pike Place Market. Stand on the red cobblestone and look toward the iconic red neon “Public Market Center” clock-sign. Our building will be on your right. Take the stairs or the elevator to the top floor.



New Years 1/19 – Open Regular Hours
 Open every day, 6:59AM to 6:00PM



94 Pike St #34 Seattle, WA 98101
(206) 780-5777



Learn More

BAINBRIDGE ISLAND, WA

ROASTING STUDIO



Our beans aren’t roasted in a facility—it’s a gallery. With natural wood, warm colors and a copper roof; the Roasting Studio was designed as a creative space where the environment becomes a canvas for creating the extraordinary.

Join us upstairs in The Tasting Room for a full service espresso bar, granola, fresh-baked goods; and a daily surprise tasting of items we are developing.



New Years 1/19 – Open Regular Hours

Mon - Fri, 6:59AM - 4:00PM
Sat - Sun, 7:59AM - 4:00PM



9459 Coppertop Loop NE Bainbridge Island, WA 98110
(206) 780-5777



Learn More

SEATTLE, WA

1ST & MADISON



Find us on the bustling corner of 1st Avenue and Madison Avenue in Downtown Seattle. We are located at the base of the renowned Kimpton Alexis Hotel; a center point to the city’s landscape, just blocks away from the waterfront.



New Years 1/19 – Open Regular Hours

Mon - Fri, 5:59AM - 5:00PM
Sat - Sun, 6:59AM - 5:00PM



1001 1st Ave Seattle, WA 98104
(206) 780-5777



Learn More

SEATTLE, WA

QUEEN ANNE



Situated atop Queen Anne Hill, we can be found amidst a hub of local shops and eateries on the corner of Queen Anne Avenue and Boston Street. Enjoy lounging in a fireside sofa or a walk through the neighborhood with Storyville.



New Years 1/19 – Open Regular Hours
Open every day, 6:59AM - 5:00PM



2128 Queen Anne Ave N Seattle, WA 98109
(206) 780-5777



Learn More

IN SHOP MENU

ESPRESSO

MILK OPTIONS: Organic Milk (Whole or 1%) or Soy Mylk, Almond Mylk (Housemade and sweetened with Medjool Dates), Coconut Cashew Mylk (Housemade and sweetened with maple syrup)

ESPRESSO

Storyville Sunrise, a smooth espresso blend with hints of caramel, chocolate and toffee; the foundation to all our espresso drinks.

AMERICANO

Espresso and hot water.

MACCHIATO

Espresso marked with milk. A traditional three ounce coffee drink with an intense coffee taste, balanced by the creaminess of milk.

CORTADO

Espresso cut with steamed milk, served in a five ounce Gibraltar glass.

CAPPUCCINO

Espresso with thick velvety steamed milk.

LATTE

Espresso and steamed milk. A luscious, creamy and naturally sweet beverage. A crowd pleaser.

MOCHA

Espresso, steamed milk and Storyville’s housemade chocolate sauce.

BREWED COFFEE



FRENCH PRESS

Fresh coffee press featuring your choice of Prologue (regular) or Epilogue (decaf).
12oz (1 Cup)
32oz (Serves 1-3)
48oz (Serves 4-6)

COLD BREW

Sweet heavy elixir. Grounds steeped in cold water for 16 hours to accentuate natural sweetness. Served on ice.

COLD BREW LATTE

Cold brew mixed with milk. Served on ice.

DRINKS



TEA

Chinese Green, Chamomile, Peppermint, Earl Grey, English Breakfast and Tangerine Ginger

TEA LATTE

Tea, steamed milk and housemade vanilla syrup.

HOUSEMADE CHAI LATTE

The perfect balance of sweet and spicy.

HOT CHOCOLATE

Housemade chocolate sauce with steamed milk.

ITALIAN SODA

Housemade from market fresh fruit, mixed with our in-house seltzer tap.
For a sweeter treat, add cream.

BAKED FRESH



FROSTED CINNAMON ROLL

We saw that the world needed the perfect cinnamon roll so we stepped up... you’re welcome.

ESTHER MAE'S GRANOLA

House recipe. Toasty goodness loaded with coconut flakes, nuts, dried cranberries and honey. Served with yogurt or milk.
Add Market Fresh Fruit

LEMON CAKE

We can neither confirm nor deny that this lemon cake has been known to possess certain qualities of psycho-culinary harmony known to produce happiness and good vibrations.
Add whipped cream and berries

CROISSANTS

An old-world favorite made with European butter.
Classic
Chocolate
Almond

CHOCOLATE CHUNK COOKIE

70% Chocolate and a pinch of Maldon sea salt.

OATMEAL COOKIE

Toasted coconut, dried pineapple, dried cranberries and chocolate.

CARMEL COOKIE

Housemade sea salt caramel baked right in.

AIRPLANE SUGAR COOKIE

A sugar cookie for our younger pilots.

MADE FRESH



BREAKFAST SANDWICH

Organic eggs and hickory smoked bacon on a fresh baked pretzel roll with your choice of cheese.
Cheddar or pesto goat cheese

GARRY'S OATMEAL (GF)

Thick-cut oats served with golden raisins and dark brown sugar.
Add Fresh Fruit

MARKET FRESH FRUIT

Beautiful seasonal fruit.
Side
Half
Full

KALE SALAD (V)(GF)

Fresh kale with currants, green apples, sunflower seeds and apple cider vinaigrette.
Add seared halloumi cheese

TOMATO SOUP (V)(GF)

A simple housemade classic with basil.
Pretzel Roll
Classic Croissant

Storyville Anywhere

Subscribe and start receiving Storyville coffee, delivered to your door with free priority shipping. As low as $12 per bag. You can pause, cancel or adjust at any time.

GET STARTED

SIGNATURE

PROLOGUE BLEND



Inspiration begins with great coffee. We don’t offer an assortment of roasts, blends, and flavors; just our one and only signature blend, wrapped like a present, sealed and shipped the same day it is roasted. To send as a gift or learn more click here: More Info



18

18

SIGNATURE DECAF

EPILOGUE BLEND



The perfect ending. The same great taste you love without the caffeine. The coffee beans are washed using the Swiss Water Process–a better-tasting alternative to the norm of using harsh chemicals–so the flavor is all there, without the buzz. To send as a gift or learn more click here: More Info

Gift Subscriptions



Send fresh coffee every month. Let us know how they brew and how many months of Storyville. We'll take it from there. They will wake up thinking of you again and again.
